channel.title: How would i
channel.description:
I have a small question about the text coloring method.
in class30_sub2_sub1_sub4 there is a method by the name of [code] public int method391(String s, int i) [/code]
and under it you have codes determining that if you type something along the lines of @red@, @gre@ etc.. itll turn your text into that color.
i was wondering if i could make it display a crown with this method.
